summary: The module implements functional tests that validate Conan's CMake toolchain handling of the Clang/LLVM compiler on Windows across different environments (standalone LLVM, MSYS2, and Visual Studio). It generates temporary C/C++ projects, configures CMake with appropriate generators (Ninja or Visual Studio), builds the code, and checks that the resulting binaries run correctly.
business_intent: To guarantee that Conan correctly configures and invokes Clang in various Windows setups, preventing regressions and providing confidence to users who rely on Conan for building C/C++ packages with Clang.
